headline: FirstEnergy Crews Ready for Winter Storm; Offer Tips to Stay Safe and Warm During Extreme Cold
summary: With a winter storm and bitter cold moving across much of the country, FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) electric companies are ready to respond. Crews have prepared for the weather, and we're reminding customers of simple steps they can take to stay safe and manage energy during the cold stretch. Current forecasts show the entire FirstEnergy service area will feel the drop in temperatures through next week. Many areas are also expecting snow, and crews are preparing for the extra challenges that hea
